title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4037.1 - Dead heat not run off
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4037.1 - Dead heat not run off

State Regulations

When a race results in a dead heat, the dead heat shall
not be run off. In the event of a dead heat, owners shall divide the purse
except where division would conflict with the conditions of the
race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4037.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
